name: ESCAPE THE LAB (itch) (nad_labs)
description:
Read me first:

The browser version is LAGGY . If you want to try the game, the browser version is more than enough. If you want to play it without any interruptions or, if you are going to be recording this game, please download it. 

You are a test subject for an evil scientist looking to take over the world. This scientist makes monsters to add to his ever growing arsenal. It is up to you to escape the lab and stop the scientist in his tracks.
